data.message: My hopes are back up for it album shady it bet freestyle was kinda wack but I ain't gonna hold it against u the message in this song is deep like high expectations feeling like a god on water but unsure and doub ting urself n the ice could crack at any minuet. Beyonce is beautiful on this I'm reli looking forward to popping some revival pills and losing myself. Ur the goat slim ur only human like us a lot of pressure is put in u lol just expect too much I don't buy music anymore but I'll buy this shit over new shit any day. Don't set the bar too high lol but I'm looking forward to this. 40 oz of fight music boiiii
